meanings.definition: In a way that is impossible to imagine or consider.
meanings.sent1: The magician performed tricks so unthinkably amazing that the audience gasped in awe.
meanings.sent2: She ran unthinkably fast in the race, leaving her competitors far behind.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a cat driving a car is unthinkably silly!
meanings.sent4: His generosity was unthinkably vast, like an endless ocean of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak was unthinkably high, reaching up to touch the sky.

meanings.definition: To an extent that is beyond belief or comprehension.
meanings.sent1: The news of the treasure hidden in the old house spread unthinkably quickly throughout the town.
meanings.sent2: She unthinkably solved the complex puzzle in just a few minutes.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a dog flying a plane is unthinkably absurd!
meanings.sent4: His talent for painting was unthinkably deep, like diving into an ocean of colors.
meanings.sent5: The storm raged unthinkably loud, shaking the entire house with its fury.
